thread.title: CCE agrees €28bn three-way merger to create European Coke bottling giant
thread.title_full: CCE agrees €28bn three-way merger to create European Coke bottling giant

title: CCE agrees €28bn three-way merger to create European Coke bottling giant
text:
06 Aug 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Coca-Cola Enterprises has agreed a merger with fellow Coke bottles in Iberia and Germany to create a new $12.6bn Western European Coca-Cola bottler. Available to members only
